segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the water overflowing and forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't feel the water on her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, and the water is just pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside through the window, it looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked neatly on the counter, waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron looks clean and tidy, unlike the mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be in for a surprise when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes soon before the water spreads too much.
segments.speaker: PAR
